function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Disruption to manufacturing businesses","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Travel restrictions and social distancing impacting availability of inspectors and delivery staff","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shutting down of floor trading impacting commodity exchange","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low levels of animal pharmaceuticals from large drug suppliers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 outbreak and its impact on global healthcare systems","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforced border shutdowns, travel restrictions, and quarantine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global crash in demand for agricultural commodities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of sars-cov-2 through the handling of waste materials from households and quarantine facilities with covid-19 patients.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data on sars-cov-2 prevalence and persistence in wastewater, hindering informed risk management actions for the wastewater sector.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential aerosol transmission of covid-19, similar to previous outbreaks like sars-cov, necessitating further research and risk management actions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of novel rna viruses presenting a serious threat to global public health and disease control","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential vulnerabilities in waste and wastewater management due to widespread community infection and quarantining","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unknown variability in sars-cov-2 viral shedding rates between people and within people at different stages of infection.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for inaccurate detection of sars-cov-2 re-emergence or presence/absence through wastewater monitoring.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of widely-accepted surveillance system for detecting the potential community presence of covid-19 through wastewater monitoring.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible faecal-oral transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unpublished data on infectious sars-cov-2 in faecal samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of wastewater \n’analysis’ for monitoring covid-19 incidence","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of diseases through air vents and plumbing systems in housing complexes.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 in wastewater, indicating potential presence of the virus.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Genetic similarity of sars-cov-2 to sars-cov, and potential for faecal-oral transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in waste collection time of 72 hours","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited sharing of patient data between health authorities and waste services sector","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of viral aerosols through wastewater systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Home isolation and pop-up quarantine facilities for covid-19 patients","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dispersed nature of cases and infected individuals","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential role of the environment in the spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Likelihood of additional transmission mechanisms in confined spaces with dense populations","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission via fomites, aerosols, and faecal-oral route","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of sars-cov-2 on surfaces for several days","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 via contaminated objects and surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty around viral shedding from asymptomatic carriers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High contagiousness of sars-cov-2","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of sars-cov-2 in waste and wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of virus transmission in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about the virus structure and implications for waste management","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial impacts on waste and wastewater industries","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improperly configured, maintained, or cleaned ventilation system","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of outdoor air circulation and constant air movement","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to follow additional protective measures such as wearing masks, gloves, and practicing physical distancing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Extended short-range aerosol transmission of the virus in crowded and poorly ventilated enclosures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Debate regarding transmission of small airborne aerosols through ventilation systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Aerosol transmission of sars-cov-2 through hvac system","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Short-range aerosol transmission due to low ventilation rate","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for contamination and spread in indoor dining settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Debate about the effectiveness of ventilation in reducing the transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent understanding of the role of aerosol airborne transmission in the spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential negligence in addressing airborne transmission risks due to conflicting expert opinions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission due to inadequate ventilation and air filtration.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential leakage of exhaust air back into the air supply due to energy recovery ventilation systems.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
